website_summaries.verdict: A beef bone broth protein powder that may help soothe the gut and counteract the degenerative signs of aging.
pros: Free of potentially hazardous contaminants, including antibiotics, growth hormones, artificial flavors, prescription drug metabolites, steroids, and insecticides
Includes the full spectrum of amino acids to promote enhanced digestive health
Natural flavor makes it a wonderful powder to use in a smoothie or shake
cons: Mixtures may become frothy and undrinkable if they are not consumed within the first few minutes after blending

customer_reviews.title: A very neutral tasting and filling protein powder - I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lots of different protein powders - hemp, whey, soy etc I moved to this one after going Keto. . . I was weary at first yet have been very happy with it - just ordered for the second time. I use it w/a half a banana and some berries, add spinach, flax, almond milk and some vitamins and it's my lunch most days. Taste is fine (neutral?) and fills me for hours. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl A in Portland

customer_reviews.title: Clump! Dump!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the vanilla version of this protein powder. I’ve tried twice to mix it into my coffee. I think the picture I provided says it all. It won’t mix. Even worse it turns to a gel like goo that I can’t get off my spoon with my fingernail. After I pushed the clumps aside to taste it the flavor wasn’t bad. I really wish I could use it since I waisted $20 on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Meeker

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using bone broth protein for the last year. I replaced the typical whey powders with bone broth because it would always hurt my stomach, and I’m glad I’ve made that choice. I started with Dr.Axe’s powders, which are great, but leave a strange after taste. This stuff tastes a lot better! The chocolate flavor is good and isn’t overbearing. It also mixes better in the blender. Overall a really great option to try.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: LUMPY MESS WILL NOT MIX WITH HOT LIQUID!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is just plain awful. There was another brand of chocolate bone broth powder I had been getting on Subscribe and Save that was taken off the list. I had to order this one instead. It doesn't even compare. I add it to my VERY HOT coffee and it just lumps up. Even the dang lumps sometimes form a lumpy film around each lump and on the spoon, as well. Horrible. Too late to return (don't even know if I could this being an edible item). Whoever makes this needs to reformulate it. This is not cheap either. Not worth the effort of mixing and mixing and mixing. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Experience

customer_reviews.title: Nice, light flavor
customer_reviews.text: Nice, light flavor. Has 20 grams of protein for only 85 calories and all the amino acids that are essential for supporting muscles. Nothing artificial, real food! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Okay, not great
customer_reviews.text: It’s OKAY but I prefer a different brand and as that brand was temporarily unavailable on Amazon, I tried this one instead. Not the same quality or taste, for sure. I never finished it. Gave it away and bought my usual brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: No more stomach bloat!
customer_reviews.text: I started drinking this to get rid of my stomach issues - bloat, constipation, cramps. I finally figured out that the whey protein in most protein mixes was the culprit! My stomach is finally quiet! My kids drink it too when I add whole milk for a shake. I’m picky about flavors and I think this stuff is great!! I use my bullet to blend it up - I usually drink it with rice or coconut milk, add blueberries and spinach. Def worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: No aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: There is no aftertaste and is very filling and it tastes delicious. My skin feels & looks great and with all healthy ingredients it’s by far the best protein shake I’ve had... the vanilla & chocolate are so good.. I always add a half of a banana & 8 oz of unsweetened almond milk. It is so worth trying. Kathy, Barnegat NJ
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using bone broth since the beginning- great taste and price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using bone broth since the beginning- great taste and price And mixed well. Cheaper than other ones I’ve used. And didn’t have that weird icky fake sugar taste. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laceykthoughts

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate keto smoothie
customer_reviews.text: If you're on keto this is a lifesaver! Chocolate smoothies are great. Way better than 🐔 bone broth!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Taekwondo

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love with the benefits of collagen/bone broth as I’ve seen ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with the benefits of collagen/bone broth as I’ve seen such improvement in my hair, skin and joints...and this is perfect for smoothies or a delicious hot chocolate as it dissolves easily ...I don’t eat meat but the benefits of collagen made me reconsider adding it to my diet...I do add a few extra goodies like cacao powder, cayenne, honey, maca ...ooh and add some cacao butter for a bullet proof version...YUM!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot mix product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible. Cannot seem to get this mix, to mix in with any liquid product!! It clumps up on contact with liquid. I've tried a blender, and electric mixer!! It's just gross!
customer_reviews.author: Michele F

customer_reviews.title: Sour taste. Bad batch.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this brand of protein powered but the last four I received with the same batch number had a nasty sour taste. Unfortunately I waisted money on two because I did not open them in the return period time frame.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: I love how this stuff tastes in my coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love how this stuff tastes in my coffee! It's also really good if you blend it with almond milk, then let it sit in the fridge overnight...it turns into chocolate mousse.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D'Ambrosia

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Free from all the things I am sensitive to, so works out great for me. I mix it with peanut butter to give it more flavor. I have had no problems with it mixing up. I use Coconut Milk and naturals peanut butter and 1 scoop of the powder in a single serve blender, and it mixes just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mystery product...what is this???
customer_reviews.text: I’ve previously purchased this item 3 times and it always came with a label. What arrived today has no label, no brand name, no nutrition info, no ingredient list, no instructions. I have no idea what is in this canister. Sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Crafter

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate Dream!
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo good!! I feel like I am eating chocolate ice cream or milk shakes! It blends well and it tastes bomb! Hard to believe it is a bone broth! Definitely buying again! It is REALLY GOOD! On my second one. This is going to be a regular purchase DEFINITELY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyric

customer_reviews.title: Bone Broth Powder
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bone broth powder for over a year now. I use it in my coffee fir a great mocha coffee. I recently had a bone density scan for osteoporosis. There has been great improvement since drinking the bone broth. Fir the first time in years, I no longer have osteoporosis. It has improved to osteopenia. I will continue using the bone broth.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Rost

customer_reviews.title: Unique Taste
customer_reviews.text: Tastes kind of like steak to me, it might need more vanilla flavor. Not bad though.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Only protein I’ll use
customer_reviews.text: I quit taking protein powders for years until I came across this product. Most protein powder upset my stomach and I also wanted to avoid any dairy/gluten and things of that nature. Very impressed with the product and now have a shake daily after my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: cash Foster

customer_reviews.title: Blah, go with the pricier ones
customer_reviews.text: I actually had to go back and make sure I didn’t get unflavored. In a shake texture is fine; mixed with yogurt though and there are congealed chewy globs. Wish I hadn’t cheated out and gone with the pricier one I had tried before
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good if added with other things like strawberries or peanut butter powder, but you can taste the brothy-ness if it's by itself. It's also impossible to mix it by hand or shaker bottle. You need to use a high powered blender or else it's chunky.
customer_reviews.author: Alteran_Tech

customer_reviews.title: Mixes smooth and creamy!
customer_reviews.text: This protein power is better than I expected! I drink shakes everyday, and was looking for something different. Mostly less sugar, no fake ingredients, and healthier. This bone broth powder mixed up creamy and smoother than my other “top of the line” shake powder. The vanilla flavor is mild but very tasty! I will be re ordering this again!
customer_reviews.author: Julz

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting product and very easy to add to shakes
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting product and very easy to add to shakes. Warm up some Almond milk and add a scoop for a bit of warm chocolate delight.
customer_reviews.author: Shae Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting
customer_reviews.text: Finally a great tasting bone broth for my morning breakfast. I mix with unsweetened vanilla almond milk and a fat bomb! Awesome for keto
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste like vanilla
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a vanilla flavor, and this didn’t taste anything like vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: rar2424

customer_reviews.title: Great for joints and nutrients the body needs!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for joint relief with Multiple Sclerosis pain. This is a great mix. With MS I need to watch the foods and supplements that I take in and this makes a great breakfast shake with water believe it or not. Mix it correctly and it is wonderful. I add a small helping of Organic Almond Butter to it... fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Simon

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet but ove it!
customer_reviews.text: This is very sweet, but I don’t mind it. I made protein pancakes with it and didn’t have to add any syrup! So far I love it more than a traditional protein powder due to the nutritional benefits, no complaints here
customer_reviews.author: RALMARAZ8A

customer_reviews.title: Great product - recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: really love this flavor, the product is as advertised and really would like to continue using it.... the benefits will be observed over time and look forward to positive results....
customer_reviews.author: Tony d

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bone broth
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bone broth. I was buying multiple protein powders at home for the gym, for the kids, to cleanse, etc. As a mother of two, It has freed me a little time during my days without feeling that i have compromised my nutritional needs. I feel comfortable that this bone broth protein has all my needs covered. The monk fruit sweet flavor is a great plus too!
customer_reviews.author: Yarida

customer_reviews.title: Love the taste!
customer_reviews.text: I mix with almond link and frozen tart cherries. Mix in my Ninja blender and get a deliciously smooth shake.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Turns into something like jello -YUK!
customer_reviews.text: YUK! I would never buy this again. If you don’t drink it within a few minutes, it turns into a jello consistency. I tried milk, water, blended it with ice, shook it up, it’s just gross.
customer_reviews.author: Tonyasedona

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I added coconut oilto my hot chocolate bone broth. This is a satisfying treat.
customer_reviews.author: CAJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: What I really don't like about this product is that it doesn't mix in hot water. It clumps into solid gooey pieces. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Local 66

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bone broth came with no nutrition label at all no brand label... completely blank
customer_reviews.author: David Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Seriously good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This protein is fantastic! I read a lot of reviews and the biggest complaint was chunkiness which is not a problem using a shaker bottle, you just shake a little longer. As far as taste I was really impressed, this is my new protein plan. I haven't noticed anything that I do not like.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and not too heavy. Blends better when you add a little hot water to it first then add the rest of your smoothie ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Tara DW

customer_reviews.title: No Carbs
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff...this is great in bullet proof coffee. I'm doing Keto Diet and unlike some others this has 0 carbs so even better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Angier

customer_reviews.title: Daily protein with bone broth.
customer_reviews.text: Mixes very well no chunks tastes great excellent way to take bone broth for health and muscle building. I stared using this a month ago and have gained 5kbs of lean muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Tal

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been utilizing various protein powders for years trying to find on that would accomplish my health goals and not result in any side effects. This protein delivers that, with high quality results and no awful gut reactions afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Keller

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good with almond milk and some powdered peanut putter and ice.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate bone broth protein
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't mix well on anything and the taste is not the best. Will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good but can be great
customer_reviews.text: Flavour is good, price is very good taking into consideration it is from grass fed animals but I gave 4 stars because it is a bit hard to get it to blend well.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: ... trying this product because the vanilla was not my favorite but this flavor is amazing
customer_reviews.text: So I was a little skeptical of trying this product because the vanilla was not my favorite but this flavor is amazing! The taste is great and it turns into a hot chocolate when you warm it up, whats not to love about that :)
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: Taste is good but it didnt come with a label? Hopefully I got the right product
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: % of bone broth and fake sugar leaves horrible taste in your moth.
customer_reviews.text: Fake sweetener, nothing stating % of bone broth. Sending it back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Worst protein powder I’ve ever used. It is gritty and does not dissolve and also leaves a very unpleasant aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: I really like this bone broth
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bone broth. I put it in my kale shakes with coconut oil every morning. Mixes great in my Nutribullet, not clumpy at all. Thickens it just enough for a filling breakfast shake.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Woodbury

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: First time trying today- I love it! I blended it in my daily spinach shake. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Excellent taste and mixes well!! I have ordered the chocolate and vanilla flavor and switch up every day!!
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice flavor, good consistency when mixed with yogurt. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: linda lamberti

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Taste is pretty good. Mixes best when using bullet blender
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this protein powder! It tastes great and makes me feel great. There isn’t anything I would change!
customer_reviews.author: Cammym310

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I like adding nutrients to my kale smoothies to get rid of the lawn clippings flavor. I have found chocolate flavored items do the trick nicely. That aside, look at all the quality ingredient in this powder! I will be adding this as a staple to my diet.
customer_reviews.author: EllenTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting. Clumpy and nasty
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting. Clumpy and nasty. Even though late night non comedians make fun of the product CAVEMAN from InfoWars, it blows any of this crap away. They had a problem with the "rights" to use the name CAVEMAN, so until they rebrand, my quest for something remotely as good and healthy will lead me through this kind of garbage.....
customer_reviews.author: By The Way

customer_reviews.title: Okay, milk but WITH bones (not boneless?)
customer_reviews.text: You would have told my dome about Bone-in milk a month ago I would have Been like “Ah Hell , naw!” but now let be be real, this is pretty good. I make In in the bullet blender. If you spoon this you failed the Darwin test. Stop... just please stop spooning this, please. Buy a blender with a motor you basic *BIT&$* Become alpha and figure your life out! Buy this, blend, drink but ummm maybe avoid coffee? And one more truth bomb AVOCADO TOAST IS *SH!TTTTTTT*
customer_reviews.author: Alfred M. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Not for soup
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best tasting broth I have ever had! I had a recipe for some chili beans that called for chocolate. It also called for broth as the base. I saw this amazing product and thought how brilliant of an idea it would be to put in the beans, plus the fact that it has protein in it for my growing boys. Needless to say, not even the dog would eat my beans, but after I discovered how good it is with milk, it works out great for my morning replacement meals.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I add to my coffee with some coconut milk. It is clumpy without using a good blender- but I’ve gotten past that since I don’t want to clean the blender at 5:30 in the morning. That said- the taste is good. Sugar free but not too sweet and the flavor incorporates well. Price is good, I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes wonderful in my morning coffee! I can’t handle regular bone broth but this powder is delicious. If. You put it in coffee, it’s best to blend it. I brew the coffee then put it in my bullet with a scoop of the powder, a little sweetener & coconut milk. Great breakfast and it holds me over until lunch.
customer_reviews.author: SB Christian

customer_reviews.title: A GOD SEND! MIRACLE PROTEIN POWDER
customer_reviews.text: THIS BONE BROTH IS SOO DELICIOUS! MAKES GREAT SMOOTHIES AND I LOVE THAT IT IS SWEETENED WITH MONK FRUIT AND NON-GMO (VERY IMPORTANT)! MY NAILS HAVE GOT SO MUCH HARDER AND STRONGER AFTER JUST A COUPLE MONTHS AND MY JOINTS FEEL SO MUCH BETTER. I DID NOT EXPECT SUCH AMAZING RESULTS ESPECIALLY IN,SUCH A SHORT TIME BUT AM NOW A BIG FAN AND BELIEVER IN THIS. FROM NOW ON IT'S 2 SERVINGS OF BONE BROTH PROTEIN FOR ME EVERYDAY...I FEEL GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: aGODlovinggirl

customer_reviews.title: Mixes horribly
customer_reviews.text: This product only mixes well with a blender and other ingredients on low speed if possible. If you mix in a blender for too long or too fast it will turn in tirely into froth. I purchased this product for the amount of protein per scoop and flavor. But I will likely not purchase this again, because I do not have the time to nurture it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of hard to put in a cup shake it and go. You have to blend it in a blender or it's super clumpy and gluey. Definitely has a certain odd taste to it but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Healthy
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th order of this Bone Broth Powder. Love the Chocolate flavor, but I also have Vanilla as well and they make delicious, healthy shakes. I'm addicted and will continue to purchase this product. I appreciate the seller's commitment to customer satisfaction - they reach out to me to make sure I'm happy with the purchase and have given me helpful hints and recipes for the product. Highly recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Leapyeargal

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Gross
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. Powder would not dissolve in the protein shaker like other powders do. I decided to blend it and it still doesn't seem to have dissolved. As I drink it, I can see lumps the size of ice cubes. I was definately not prepared for the smell, it's horrendous and the after taste is just as bad! If this is what it's meant to do, then I guess it did its job. Not sure if I will try it again or if I should trash it because IDK if I can get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Had I kniwn that it tasted so good I would have purchased it much sooner. I make a shake using almond or coconut milk, vanilla, collagen powder and a dash of cinnamon. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele Kendall

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PROTEIN
customer_reviews.text: Taste kind of funny, however a bit of vanilla essence with my shakes fixed this issue for me, blends well but the froth is unreal lol so make sure you do not over mix, agitate or blend and you'll be ok. i use it as a breakfast meal replacement make it onto fruit smoothies and post workout, Im not a fan of the taste with just water so i always add fruits and a dash of vanilla and put it on blender for 40sec
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia

customer_reviews.title: but the after taste is like drinking regular
customer_reviews.text: The initial flavor is very chocolatey, but the after taste is like drinking regular, very strong bone broth. It’s not great, the afterflavor completely ruins it. I couldn’t force it down, so threw the container out. 0/10 do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N.S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it :)
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love. I have a hard time drinking bone broth but want the benefits. THIS IS IT. Taste great, and I feel great. My skin continues to look younger everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best blended in a blender
customer_reviews.text: Really yummy protein powder that tastes so creamy! Best blended in a blender, not a blender bottle. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie D.

customer_reviews.title: Needs hot water to dissolve.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be dissolved in hot water before being added to a smoothie. Taste was ok.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Blends great in my Blendtec. Flavor(vanilla) tastes good. Since my purchase, I have recommended this powder to my friends that use protein powders. I will definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great protein.
customer_reviews.text: Great protein. Mixes easy and tastes fine. I use after the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C.

customer_reviews.title: Foam, foam, and then some more foam.
customer_reviews.text: It's unfortunate, I really wanted to like this product. While the company sent an email, without being asked, to help with how to mix it, it's still inconvenient. I cannot make a shake on demand as the foam takes an hour to settle, and with that, still never goes away. I used my Nutribullet to mix, a shake mixer and just stirring it. The taste is okay. While the focus was to branch out from Ancient Nutrition Bone Broth Protein Powder, due to its high cost, I just just bought a canister to return to my staple for high-protein/low carb needs. It's possibly great for you, but best be informed.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn26

customer_reviews.title: Taste/Effect/Price = is it worth it?
customer_reviews.text: This is great tasting, I add it to the blender to my smoothie with almond milk. I only blend it for a few seconds, avoiding the air bubbles and clumping that mixing this other ways can cause. More important to me than great taste is how I feel, and this is dairy/lactose free, and doesn't make me sick. The price is pretty high, and I'm hoping to be convinced that it's worth it, so I keep reading reviews .
customer_reviews.author: Laralivia

product_meta.title: Bone Broth Protein Powder Chocolate - Non-GMO Grass-Fed Collagen Peptides - Monk Fruit Sweetened No Sugar Paleo & Keto Suitable -Dairy Gluten Soy & Corn Free Ancient Form of Nutrition (17.21oz, 488)
product_meta.description:
Color:Cocoa Chocolate

⭐ RENOVATIO - noun. To REnovate, to REnew, to REstore ⭐

At Renovatio Nutritionwe believe every person has an innate capacity to renovate and restore themselves if they are under the right nourishing conditions. This is why we’ve made it our lasting purpose to share bone broth’s rich history with a new generation.

We have a deep reverence for time-honored nutrition and responsibly sourced ingredients. The more things change, the more they stay the same. Your grandma probably made a variation of bone broth in her kitchen. But just because many of us lack the time to prepare a proper bone broth, we’re no less appreciative of its healthy, velvety goodness and zesty nourishment. Bone Broth protein powder allows you to take in all the benefits of Bone Broth without the shopping, travel, preparation and cooking time.

How to use? Simply mix 1 scoop of Bone Broth Protein Powder in 12 oz of your favorite healthy drink and mix with a blender.

OUR GUARANTEE: Our product is FREE of potentially hazardous contaminants, including antibiotics, growth hormones, artificial flavors, prescription drug metabolites, steroids, and insecticides. It's also Non-GMO, Gluten Free, Soy Free, Dairy Free and Nut-Free!

With a trusted brand like RENOVATIO NUTRITION you are GUARANTEED the highest quality Bone Broth from pure, pasture-raised, grass-fed cows.

✅5% GOES TO CLEAN OCEANS ✅ RENOVATIO NUTRITION , through our partnerships with the Nonprofits OCEANA, 4 Ocean & Surfrider - Will provide 5% of our yearly profits to clean our oceans and keep our sea life safe.

For the Wellbeing of our 🌏, Please Recycle ♻ The goodness of bone broth in a scoop. Keto Shake & Smoothies for improved performance and Wellbeing. Mejora tu Salud y tu Rendimiento
feature_bullets: ✅Naturally-Ocurring Collagen: Each serving has 20 grams of GRASS-FED BEEF, PASTURE-RAISED with highly-available, full-spectrum Amino Acids, COLLAGEN PROTEIN SUPERFOOD and NO SUGAR. Collagen is the main nutrient in most of your tissues. Taken daily, it may help soothe your gut & improve your digestive health, vitalize the health of your bones, joints, muscles, vital organs, skin, hair, nails and counteract the degenerative effects of aging.

✅IT's PURE AND RAW: When mixing, USE A BLENDER for 30 seconds at low speed.  We have made BONE BROTH PURE and all the goodness of homemade bone broth in a convenient, great-tasting NON-GMO natural flavor that mixes with your favorite smoothies, juices, shakes or your favorite milk. Because of its purity, the collagen and gelatin-binding nature don't mix well by hand. Please use a blender.

✅FREE OF COMMON ALLERGENS: Suitable for PALEO and KETO GENIC diets, our bone broth protein is also Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Nut Free, Grain Free, Corn Free, Preservative Free & Non-GMO Ingredients. We made Bone Broth as clean as possible so you can enjoy a true quality product with no concern about allergies or low-grade toxicity.

✅NOURISHING SUPERFOOD: 17.18 ounces of higher-availability, nutritionally-dense superfood, providing anti-inflammatory benefits to your body. Exclusive to bone broth protein is a combination of naturally-occurring Glucosamine Chondroitin, Hyaluronic Acid, and Gelatin nutrients that nourish all your tissues.

💯UNCONDITIONAL GUARANTEE > TRY IT RISK-FREE: Buy with confidence when purchasing exclusively from RENOVATIO NUTRITION. Click the “Add to Cart” button to give Bone Broth Protein a try. If you’re not 100% satisfied with your purchase, we will refund your order. There is nothing to lose and your health to gain.
